forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Thunder possible. High 12C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High near 55F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Becoming windy late. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Becoming windy overnight. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds W at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds W at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 46F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy in the morning then periods of showers later in the day. High 12C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with some showers in the afternoon. High 54F. W winds shifting to S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Becoming windy late. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 53F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 6C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 44F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 44F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and damp with rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 54F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low around 40F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High around 15C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 59F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 4C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low around 40F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine. High 16C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine. High 61F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear. Low 44F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 61F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 8C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 46F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.
